ShareActionProviderProxy * mpProxy

Detailed Description

This is a widget for a share action.

It is responsible for creating views to show a pop window with sharing pages.

Please see the following example for simple usage of ShareWidget.

injection to ActionBar 

 bool MyPage::onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu* menu) {
     mDemand = new Demand(Demand::ACTION_SEND());
     ShareWidget shareWidget(Context(this));
     shareWidget.setShareDemand(*mDemand);
     shareWidget.injectToMenu(0, 1, 1, String("ShareWith"), MenuItem::SHOW_AS_ACTION_IF_ROOM, menu);
     return true;
 }

injection to Button 

 MyClickListener::MyClickListener(ShareActionPage* page)
     : OnClickListener(), mpPage(page) {
     Context context(mpPage);
     mShareWidget = new ShareWidget(context);
     mShareWidget->setShareDemand(*mpPage->mDemand);
 }
 void MyClickListener::onClick(gaia::core::Widget * v) {
   switch (v->getId()) {
       case 1:
           mShareWidget->setAnchorWidget(v);
           mShareWidget->setIndicatorPosition(PopupArrowPanel::BOTTOM);
           mShareWidget->show();
           break;
       case 2:
           mShareWidget->showAsDialog();
           break;
   }
 }

gaia::core::Menu *  menu 
)

Inject the ShareWidget to the Menu, when your anchorView is on the ActionBar.

Parameters:
groupIdThe group identifier that this item should be part of. This can be used to define groups of items for batch state changes.
itemIdUnique item ID.
orderThe order for the item.
titleThe text to display for the item.
actionEnumSets how this item should display in the presence of an Action Bar.
menuThe Menu to injection to.

void gaia::ui::ShareWidget::setShareDemand ( const gaia::core::Demand &  demand) const

Sets an demand with information about the share action.

Here is a sample for constructing a share demand: 

 
  Demand* demand = new Demand(Demand::ACTION_SEND());
  demand->setType("image/*");
  Uri uri = Uri::fromFile(File(getFilesDir(), "foo.jpg"));
  demand->putExtra(Demand::EXTRA_STREAM(), uri.toString());
 
 
 
 
Parameters:

  

    
demandThe share demand.

  

  




See also:
Demand::ACTION_SEND
 



Demand::ACTION_SEND_MULTIPLE
void gaia::ui::ShareWidget::setShareHistoryFileName ( const gaia::base::String &  shareHistoryFile)

Sets the file name of a file for persisting the share history which history will be used for sorting share targets.

This file will be used for all view of sharing targets. Defaults to DEFAULT_SHARE_HISTORY_FILE_NAME.

Note: The history file name can be set any time, but after set the history file name, you also should reset ShareDemand.

Parameters:
shareHistoryFileThe share history file name.
